textBeforeTable: View: You can view the profile option, but cannot change it. Update: You can update the profile option. App: Application Resp: Responsibility SysAdm: System Administrator The key for the table is as follows: This section describes new profile options available in Oracle Property Manager. The table below indicates the level at which you can view and update the profile options. Profile Options Window References Contacts Location Hierarchy Countries and Territories Lookups Descriptive Flexfields and Value Sets System Options Profile Options This chapter covers the following topics: For the order in which the Oracle Property Manager setup steps should be performed, see Oracle Property Manager Setup Checklist. When you first install and set up Oracle Property Manager for your business, you must configure several components, including flexfields, lookups, and system options. After these components are properly configured, you can use Oracle Property Manager without making any routine modifications. Setup Steps in Oracle Property Manager Next Previous Contents Oracle Property Manager Implementation Guide Release 12.1 Part Number E13611-04
